channel.title: CVE Feed for Xpro -- Xpro Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xpro -- Xpro Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-43150|2024-08-14T14:53:06.431Z -- xpro -- xpro%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xpro Xpro Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Xpro Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.4.4.2.
